alert.note: Alert for Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 1:39PM CST until January 28 at 10:13AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville affecting Hunt County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cowleech Fork Sabine River at Greenville. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Caution should be exercised near the river as water begins to flow out of the banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 7.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 15.4 feet tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow night. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
